Volunteer Coordinator: Gemma Fletcher, Program Coordinator; Phone: 1.866.902.3767; Email: bc@selfmanage.org
Service Details: - Offers a FREE online, evidence-based, health education program that provides information, tools and practical skills on managing long-term health conditions- Increases the confidence and motivation people need to better manage the challenges of living with a chronic health condition- Participants log-on to the program website at their convenience, for 2-3 hours per week, in a safe and anonymous environment to give and receive support from others who are experiencing similar health issues- Programs are highly interactive and have 20-25 persons per group- Participants are provided with an accompanying resource text and resource materials at no cost - Family members and caretakers are also welcome to participate
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and up- Workshops are offered on an ongoing basis throughout the year- Workshop assignment is conducted based on a first come-first served basis on the website- Plan to commit to all six sessions
Former Name: Arthritis/Fibromyalgia Self-Management (AFSMP) ; Chronic Disease Self-Management Program (CDSMP) ; Chronic Pain Self-Management Program (CPSMP) ; Diabetes Self-Management Program (DSMP)
Print Material: Brochures and information sheets are available * please call toll free number for information
